HotelElement.Name: Wyndham Garden Potsdam (Formerly Best Western Grand City)

Description.Text:
Property Location
Located in Potsdam, Wyndham Garden Potsdam is minutes from University of Potsdam and New Palace. This 4-star hotel is within close proximity of Charlottenhof Palace and Chinese Tea House.

Rooms
Make yourself at home in one of the 91 air-conditioned rooms featuring refrigerators. Complimentary high-speed (wired) Internet access keeps you connected, and digital programming is available for your entertainment. Conveniences include phones, as well as safes and desks.

Rec, Spa, Premium Amenities
Enjoy recreation amenities such as a sauna or take in the view from a terrace. Additional features include complimentary wireless Internet access and tour/ticket assistance.

Dining
Enjoy a satisfying meal at a restaurant serving guests of Wyndham Garden Potsdam. Quench your thirst with your favorite drink at a bar/lounge. Breakfast is available for a fee.

Business, Other Amenities
Featured amenities include express check-in, a 24-hour front desk, and multilingual staff.


Pets allowed Check-in time starts at 2 PM Check-out time is noon
Enjoy a satisfying meal at a restaurant serving guests of Wyndham Garden Potsdam. Quench your thirst with your favorite drink at a bar/lounge. Breakfast is available for a fee.
Extra-person charges may apply and vary depending on hotel policy.
Government-issued photo identification and a credit card or cash deposit are required at check-in for incidental charges.
Special requests are subject to availability upon check-in and may incur additional charges. Special requests cannot be guaranteed.

Located in Potsdam, Wyndham Garden Potsdam is minutes from University of Potsdam and New Palace. This 4-star hotel is within close proximity of Charlottenhof Palace and Chinese Tea House.
Distances are calculated in a straight line from the property's location to the point of interest or attraction, and may not reflect actual travel distance.

Distances are displayed to the nearest 0.1 mile and kilometer.

University of Potsdam - 0.8 km / 0.5 mi
New Palace - 0.9 km / 0.6 mi
Charlottenhof Palace - 0.9 km / 0.6 mi
Chinese Tea House - 1.6 km / 1 mi
Orangery Palace - 1.7 km / 1 mi
Bornstedt Royal Estate - 2.1 km / 1.3 mi
Sanssouci Palace - 2.2 km / 1.3 mi
Potsdam Harbour - 2.3 km / 1.5 mi
Sanssouci Park - 2.5 km / 1.5 mi
Potsdam's Brandenburg Gate - 2.6 km / 1.6 mi
Neuer Lustgarten - 3.1 km / 1.9 mi
Film Museum - 3.1 km / 1.9 mi
Nauener Gate - 3.3 km / 2.1 mi
Gate of Fortune - 3.4 km / 2.1 mi
St. Nicolas Church - 3.4 km / 2.1 mi

The preferred airport for Wyndham Garden Potsdam is Berlin (TXL-Tegel) - 26 km / 16.1 mi.

You must present a photo ID when checking in. Your credit card is charged at the time you book. Bed type and smoking preferences are not guaranteed.Your reservation is prepaid and is guaranteed for late arrival. The total charge includes all room charges and taxes, as well as fees for access and booking. Any incidental charges such as parking, phone calls, and room service will be handled directly between you and the property.

Extra-person charges may apply and vary depending on hotel policy.
